brand_identity.name: Batas.AI
brand_identity.description: A legal assistance tool that feels like a high-end law firm's digital workspace. It balances the weight of tradition (serifs, paper tones) with the speed of AI (clean layouts, instant feedback).

scale.citation: text-xs font-mono text-primary/70 bg-primary/5 px-1 py-0.5 rounded

primary.description: Deep Navy - Represents authority and stability.

secondary.description: Bone White - Mimics high-quality legal paper, reduces eye strain.

accent.description: Terracotta - Used sparingly for alerts, critical tags, and primary CTAs.

muted.description: Cool Grey - For backgrounds and dividers.

usage_rules: Never use pure black (#000000). Use the Deep Navy or Dark Grey.
Backgrounds for reading panes should be 'Bone White' (Secondary) to simulate paper.
Primary Blue is for navigation and active states.
Terracotta Accent is for 'Action Required' or 'High Priority' items only.

layouts.sidebar: w-64 flex-shrink-0 border-r bg-background hidden md:block

accessibility.contrast_check: Ensure all text on 'Bone White' is at least Dark Grey or Deep Navy.

media.logo_style: Typographic, Serif, Bold. Simple 'Scale' or 'Pillar' icon.

3d_libraries.usage: Minimal. Use only for subtle data visualization if absolutely necessary.
3d_libraries.preferred: Recharts (2D) is preferred over 3D for legal data clarity.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add the Google Fonts import to index.css immediately.
2. CONFIGURE TAILWIND: Update tailwind.config.js with the 'Deep Navy' and 'Bone White' palette.
3. SHADCN OVERRIDES: Update the 'radius' in tailwind config to 0.25rem (rounded-sm) for a sharper, professional look.
4. LAYOUT STRATEGY: Use the 'Dashboard Shell' layout for all authenticated pages. Use 'Marketing Hero' grid for the landing page.
5. DOCUMENT VIEW: This is the core feature. Use a split-pane layout (Original Doc Left / AI Analysis Right). Use 'Bone White' background for the document pane to reduce eye strain.
6. LANGUAGE TOGGLE: Make the English/Tagalog toggle prominent in the top nav.
7. EMPTY STATES: Use the 'office_interior' image with a grayscale filter as a background for empty states or 404 pages.
universal_guidelines: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
